home.name: Sauryadeep Roy
home.compactAbout: An experienced developer and designer dedicated to crafting innovative software solutions for businesses.

about.expandedAbout: I'm Sauryadeep Roy, an experienced developer and designer dedicated to crafting innovative software solutions for businesses. With a year of hands-on experience, I specialize in creating functional and visually captivating experiences tailored to your unique needs. Committed to excellence, I prioritize your satisfaction and refine my work until it exceeds your expectations. Let's collaborate to elevate your business through cutting-edge technology and design innovation. Contact me to bring your ideas to life!

skill.description: My technical skill includes proficiency in JAVA, MuleSoft, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot. I'm also well-versed in creating APIs, AWS Cloud, and Azure DevOps.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Here are some of my notable achievements and recognitions.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Have any questions or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out!

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Explore the details of each project to learn more about my approach, the technologies used, and the results achieved.

projectsList.title: AlgoSpectra : Algorithm visualizer
projectsList.description: Developed a scalable full-stack platform to support interactive visualization of over five core data structures, crafting real-time animated flow diagrams using React Flow to deliver an intuitive and engaging user experience for algorithmic learning. Implemented a high-performance Spring Boot backend with PostgreSQL on Supabase, capable of handling secure authentications with advanced features, and deployed more than five secure RESTful API endpoints for user management, API health monitoring, and authentication control. Additionally, Streamlined the CI/CD pipeline via Firebase Hosting and GitHub Actions.

projectsList.title: StreamFlix
projectsList.description: An innovative project focused on developing a cutting-edge solution for this video streaming platform.

projectsList.title: RideWave
projectsList.description: A comprehensive tool designed for automating business processes.

projectsList.title: Billing system
projectsList.description: This software application designed for tracking inventory quantities and generating invoices efficiently. It provides a streamlined solution for managing stock levels, monitoring product availability, and creating detailed billing statements. The application ensures accuracy, enhances productivity, and simplifies inventory management for businesses.

projectsList.title: Salary prediction
projectsList.description: A machine learning software developed using Python, incorporating Matplotlib, Pandas, and NumPy to predict expected salaries based on experience and skillset. The application analyzes input data and provides accurate salary predictions, helping users make informed career decisions.

projectsList.title: Racism detection
projectsList.description: This software utilizes Natural Language Processing (NLP) to detect racism in comments. It analyzes textual data to identify and quantify racist words, providing a detailed report on the number of offensive terms detected. This tool is designed to promote responsible communication and assist in moderating online content effectively.
